posts.name: Leo & Mali
posts.cooked:
We have a Drivetrain with WCP X2 swerve modules and Kraken X60 motors. While the motors appeared in Phoenix Tuner X when we configured and licensed them, recently their status lights have gone dark. When we try to diagnose the issue in Phoenix Tuner X, they don’t show up on the dashboard when connected via USB-C to the Canivore.

The strangest part is that when we attempt to drive the robot, the motors work perfectly with no issues whatsoever. (Status Lights still Dark)

Every now and then, the motors seem to randomly turn their status lights back on.

Be honest with me… are we haunted?

PS: (Also, all our motors show orange status lights when idle, which turn green when in use. I’m assuming this is normal?) (For context, this is 3 motors on our drivetrain, the other 5 seem to be fine along with they’re encoders.)

I would reach out to CTRE support to see if they are maybe defective? I wonder if the firmware got corrupted or something and that’s whats causing this weirdness. Maybe also double check the power going to the motors, but that doesn’t really make sense since they work with code fine?!?!?

posts.name: Leo & Mali
posts.cooked: Yeah it’s really a bizarre situation… we’ve tested our wiring and it seems fine, and obviously CAN is fine as the rest of the bus works. But for some reason the motors mysteriously still drive lol…
Random thought, but are you sure the screw terminals are torque down the correct amount?

posts.name: Leo & Mali
posts.cooked: For the wires? Yes, we double checked, but even if they weren’t, the motors wouldn’t be running.
well im all out of ideas. I’m sure its something really obvious too as it always feels with electronics

SeansCoolerFriend:

(Also, all our motors show orange status lights when idle, which turn green when in use. I’m assuming this is normal?)

yep that’s 100% normal and good: TalonFX Lights Reference

posts.name: Leo & Mali
posts.cooked: Awesome, thank you! (orange is a scary color)
When you run it reverse, it flashes red and that always scares my mechanical/design friends
